title: Tubender
description: As part of Generate, a student-led organization at Northeastern, we collaborated with a startup that builds portable tube-bending machines to design their software and branding.

title: BMC Research
description: Developed a website with a research team for ENT oncology using Typescript and React, integrating a recommender system for personalized treatment recommendations.

title: Personal Website
description: This project is this current website that showcases my work as both a UX Designer and Software Engineer.
